title: Library Guides: Natural Medicines (Database): Home
author: Jill Edgerton
description: High-quality, evidence-based information on complementary and alternative medicine
cleaned_text: opens in a new window Natural Medicines offers quick access to comprehensive, evidence-based, peer-reviewed information on foods, herbs, supplements, and natural therapies. Database coverage includes efficacy, adverse effects, interactions, pregnancy, lactation, pharmacology, toxicology, dosing, standardization, and products tested by third-party laboratories. Patient handouts are available.
